meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joon Pahk Tom Kunzen John Krizel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6240.

td.p: Joon Pahk, a college physics teacher from Somerville, Massachusetts
Tom Kunzen, a geotechnical engineer from Orlando, Florida
John Krizel, a writer originally from Oceanside, New York

tr.td: LITERARY TITLE OCCUPATIONS
REAL PEOPLE ON FILM
THAT'S THE CHICAGO WAY!
BIBLICAL RELATIONS
WEBSITES
RHYME-BOT
(Alex: Each correct response will rhyme with "bot".)

Bugs Moran

JohnTomJoon
Triple Stumper
')

tr.td: John
Tom
Joon
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Tom\'s response] Oh, I can\'t even figure out what that... sign is... but you\'re wrong.)
[Tom later drew a web comic explaining his response.]
JohnWhat is I have no idea.
$1,986
TomWhat is "[rageface]"
$4,200
JoonWhat is the Algonquin Round Table?
$10,000
the Algonquin Round Table')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Harpo Marx was among this group when it met in NYC\'s Rose Room for its final time, in 1943, & found there was nothing left to say')

tr.td: NOTABLE GROUPS
Harpo Marx was among this group when it met in NYC's Rose Room for its final time, in 1943, & found there was nothing left to say
John
Tom
Joon
2nd place: $5,000 if eliminated
3rd place: $5,000 if eliminated
Automatic semifinalist
John
Tom
Joon

13 R,
7 W
(including 1 DD)

26 R
(including 2 DDs),
3 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
